logisim.changelog: * New component: I/O -> DipSwitch! * New TTL 74165: 8-bit parallel-to-serial shift register * New options for autoupdates in the preference menu * Help menu: added "Forum", "Bug Report" and "Check Updates" * Major graphical changes: -Input and output pin -Squared components now have a white background and rounded corners -In Preference/Window you can select a different java look and feel * Splitter fanout and bitwidth attributes now are 4 from default * Hex Digit: added tooltips * Brought some fix from original Logisim 2.7.2 early
